name: Locked (Doc)
description:
Game made for the Global Game Jam 2019

I've made all the assets, coding and dialogues in 48h, so please let me know if there are any mistake!
(Also English is not my mother tongue, I've noticed some errors after the build was done but it was too late to actually change them)
C&C are more than welcome

So, a quick tutorial since i haven't been able to add the tut scene into the game:

Right click to change your cursor type:

Basics (for walking and drag & dropping stuff from inventory to the game)
Inspect
Use

Movement:
click on the screen with the arrow button, double click to go faster

Inventory:
Just go in the upper part of the screen with the pointer to show the inventory

Will probably continue since there was meant to be some story in this game lmao but #priorities i guess
